actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for a special reclassification rule for certain old agencies as new agencies under the home health interim payment system.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide for a special reclassification rule for certain old home health agencies located in Penobscot County, Maine, as new home health agencies under the Medicare home health interim payment system.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for a special reclassification rule for certain old agencies as new agencies under the home health interim payment system.
